problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=2AD,∠A=60°,E,F分别为AB,CD的中点,EF=1cm,那么对角线BD的长度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AB = 2 AD, ∠A = N_0, E, F are the midpoints of AB and CD respectively, EF = N_1, then the length of the diagonal BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接DE．∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB≌lCD．∵DF=\frac{1}{2}CD,AE=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴DF平行且等于AE．∴四边形ADFE是平行四边形．∴EF=AD=1cm．∵AB=2AD,∴AB=2cm．∵AB=2AD,∴AB=2AE,∴AD=AE．∴∠1=∠4．∵∠A=60°,∠1+∠4+∠A=180°,∴∠1=∠A=∠4=60度．∴△ADE是等边三角形,∴DE=AE．∵AE=BE,∴DE=BE,∴∠2=∠3．∵∠1=∠2+∠3,∠1=60°,∴∠2=∠3=30度．∴∠ADB=∠3+∠4=90°∴BD=√{AB^{2}-AD^{2}}=√{3}cm．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题比较复杂,综合性较强,解答此题的关键是构造平行四边形,用平行四边形及等边三角形的性质,直角三角形的性质解答
